articles.title: Layoffs at Toys for Bob and Sledgehammer Games affect between 30% and 40% of staff, insider says - Eurogamer.net
articles.description: Crash Bandicoot developer Toys for Bob and Call of Duty studio Sledgehammer Games have reportedly lost around 40 per ce…
articles.content:
Crash Bandicoot developer Toys for Bob and Call of Duty studio Sledgehammer Games have reportedly lost around 40 per cent and 30 per cent of their staff, respectively.
The layoffs are part of Micros… [+1843 chars]
